price: 39. Ir tie, kurie, jiems padarius nepakeliamą blogį, atkeršija.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
